gov.nih.nlm.ling.process

Class ComponentLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nih.nlm.ling.process.ComponentLoader

  • public class ComponentLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to instantiate processing components as specified with a Properties object. It contains static methods to initialize various components, such as term annotators, spell correction components, sentence segmenters, etc., from properties.
    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ComponentLoader()

      Returns multiple instances of processing components, specified by their class names.

    • Method Detail

      • getTermAnnotators

        public static java.util.List<TermAnnotator> getTermAnnotators(java.util.Properties props)
                                                       throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                              java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                                              java.lang.InstantiationException
        Instantiates a list of term annotators from properties. It assumes the class names of the annotators are specified in a key/value pair, with the key 'termAnnotators' and the fully-qualified class names delimited with the semicolon(;) in the value. The classes specified should implement TermAnnotator interface.
        Parameters:
        props - the properties to read from
        Returns:
        a list of term annotator instances
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if a term annotator class cannot be found
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if there is a problem with accessing a term annotator
        java.lang.InstantiationException - if there is a problem with instantiating a term annotator

      • getSpellCorrection

        public static SpellCorrection getSpellCorrection(java.util.Properties props)
                                          throws java.lang.ClassCastException,
                                                 java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                 java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                                 java.lang.InstantiationException
        Instantiates a spelling correction module from properties. It assumes the class name is specified in a key/value pair, with the key 'spellCorrection' and the fully-qualified class name as the value. The class specified should implement SpellCorrection interface.
        Parameters:
        props - the properties to read from
        Returns:
        a spelling correction module instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - if the specified class does not except SpellCorrection interface
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if a spelling correction class cannot be found
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if there is a problem with accessing a spelling correction method
        java.lang.InstantiationException - if there is a problem with instantiating a spelling correction method

        public static SentenceSegmenter getSentenceSegmenter(java.util.Properties props)
                                              throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                     java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                                     java.lang.InstantiationException,
                                                     java.lang.ClassCastException
        Instantiates a sentence segmenter from properties. It assumes the class name is specified in a key/value pair, with the key 'sentenceSegmenter' and the fully-qualified class name as the value. The class specified should implement SentenceSegmenter interface.
        Parameters:
        props - the properties to read from
        Returns:
        a sentence segmenter module instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - if the specified class does not except SentenceSegmenter interface
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the sentence segmenter class cannot be found
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if there is a problem with accessing the sentence segmenter
        java.lang.InstantiationException - if there is a problem with instantiating the sentence segmenter

      • getComponent

        public static java.lang.Object getComponent(java.util.Properties props,
                                            java.lang.String propName)
                                     throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                            java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                            java.lang.InstantiationException
        Returns an instance of a processing component, specified by a class name.
        Parameters:
        props - the properties to read from
        propName - the property that indicates the class name for the component
        Returns:
        an instance of the processing component
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the component class cannot be found
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if there is a problem with accessing the component
        java.lang.InstantiationException - if there is a problem with instantiating the component

      • getComponents

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Object> getComponents(java.util.Properties props,
                                                             java.lang.String propName,
                                                             java.lang.String separator)
                                                      throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                                             java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                                             java.lang.InstantiationException
        Returns multiple instances of processing components, specified by their class names.
        Parameters:
        props - the properties to read from
        propName - the property that indicates the class names for the component
        separator - the delimiter between the class names
        Returns:
        a list of the processing components
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if a component class cannot be found
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if there is a problem with accessing a component
        java.lang.InstantiationException - if there is a problem with instantiating a component
